column4: I'm using intrepid. Is there any way I can get MySQL 5.1? I've seen it available in jaunty....
Can I install jaunty app for mysql-server-5.1 in intrepid?
don't mix packages for ubuntu versions
why ? what's in 5.1 that you need
there's a bug in 5.0 that's causing me hell and its fixed in 5.1
log bug against the mysql package to get the bug fix back ported
if you log a but on launchpad.net against the mysql package the bug fix you want will be back ported to 8.10
but that will probably take weeks, eh?
speak to the package maintainer, it can be turned around quite quick
you need to log a new bug
have you created an account yet ?
